com.github.triceo.splitlog

Interface LogWatch


  • public interface LogWatch
    The primary point of interaction with this tool. Allows users to start listening to changes in log files. Use LogWatchBuilder to get an instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isTerminated()
      Whether or not terminateTailing() has been called.
      boolean isTerminated(LogTailer tail)
      Whether or not terminateTailing(LogTailer) has been called for this tailer.
      LogTailer startTailing()
      Begin watching for new messages from this point in time.
      boolean terminateTailing()
      Stop tailing for all tailers and free resources.
      boolean terminateTailing(LogTailer tail)
      Terminate a particular tailer.

    • Method Detail

      • isTerminated

        boolean isTerminated()
        Whether or not terminateTailing() has been called.
        Returns:
        True if it has.

      • isTerminated

        boolean isTerminated(LogTailer tail)
        Whether or not terminateTailing(LogTailer) has been called for this tailer.
        Parameters:
        tail - Tailer in question.
        Returns:
        True if it has.

      • startTailing

        LogTailer startTailing()
        Begin watching for new messages from this point in time.
        Returns:
        API for watching for messages.

      • terminateTailing

        boolean terminateTailing()
        Stop tailing for all tailers and free resources.
        Returns:
        True if terminated as a result, false if already terminated.

      • terminateTailing

        boolean terminateTailing(LogTailer tail)
        Terminate a particular tailer.
        Parameters:
        tail - This tailer will receive no more messages.
        Returns:
        True if terminated as a result, false if already terminated.
